alert.note: Alert for Itasca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 16 at 6:02PM CDT until August 16 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Duluth has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... South Central Itasca County in north central Minnesota... * Until 900 PM CDT. * At 602 PM CDT, trained weather spotters reported thunderstorms producing heavy rain in Flash flooding has been reported in Grand Rapids. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of up to 1.5 inches are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is already occurring. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Trained spotters reported. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Grand Rapids, Cohasset, Coleraine, Gunn, Pokegama Dam, Trout Lake Near Bovey, Blackberry, Bovey and La Prairie. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
